He's also a child of the Demon King!?\""},{"lineNumber":226329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は武者修行の旅に出ていると聞いたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I heard he's now on a warrior's training <Yell>."},{"lineNumber":226340,"originalJapaneseLine":"　旅は順調でしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is your journey going well?\""},{"lineNumber":226341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毛利家の嫡子、毛利元就。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The heir of the Mōri family, Mōri Motonari."},{"lineNumber":226342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼は魔王の四男に当たる人物です」","translatedEnglishLine":"He is said to be the fourth son of the Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":226343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは早速、評価を見てみましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then, let's take a look at his evaluation.\""},{"lineNumber":226344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「評価点は三つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are three evaluation points."},{"lineNumber":226345,"originalJapaneseLine":"　友好は仲良くなる難度、捕捉は捕まえやすさ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Friendliness is the difficulty in becoming close, Capture is how easy it is to catch,"},{"lineNumber":226346,"originalJapaneseLine":"　命令はあなたの言うことを聞いてくれるかです」","translatedEnglishLine":"and Obedience is whether he will listen to your commands.\""},{"lineNumber":226347,"originalJapaneseLine":"毛利家跡継ぎ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The heir of the Mōri family,"},{"lineNumber":226348,"originalJapaneseLine":"毛利元就の評価。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mōri Motonari's evaluation."},{"lineNumber":226349,"originalJapaneseLine":"友好難度：★★★★★　★★★","translatedEnglishLine":"Friendliness Difficulty: ★★★★★★★★"},{"lineNumber":226350,"originalJapaneseLine":"捕捉難度：★★★★★　★★★","translatedEnglishLine":"Capture Difficulty: ★★★★★★★★"},{"lineNumber":226351,"originalJapaneseLine":"命令難度：★★★★★　★★★★","translatedEnglishLine":"Obedience Difficulty: ★★★★★★★★★"},{"lineNumber":226352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな感じですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Something like this.\""},{"lineNumber":226353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毛利元就は非常に危険な人物です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mōri Motonari is a very dangerous individual.\""},{"lineNumber":226354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言動を間違えると殺されます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you make a mistake in your words or actions, you'll be killed."},{"lineNumber":226355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気をつけて下さいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please be careful.\""},{"lineNumber":226356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、また」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, goodbye.\""},{"lineNumber":226357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、なにこれ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":226358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全体的に難度高ぇ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Everything is hard overall!"},{"lineNumber":226359,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てか、気をつけてって何したらいいの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I mean, what am I supposed to do to be careful!?"},{"lineNumber":226360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「目を合わせないとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like, not making eye contact or something...?"},{"lineNumber":226361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「腹を空かせている時には近づかねぇとか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or not approaching when he's hungry or something?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「フンッ、面白そうじゃねーか！
「がはははははははははははははは！」
仕方ない、僕達も行こう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It can't be helped, let's go too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっははははははははは！」
もっと強い奴はいないのか！」
小柄な体躯に、それよりも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a small frame, and even more so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な刃物――刀を振り回して戦う男がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a man fighting by swinging around a huge blade—a sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀を振り回すだけで周囲の魔物達は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by swinging his sword, the surrounding monsters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斬り裂かれて吹き飛ばされる。
その戦ぶりは、豪快の一言に尽きた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His style of fighting could be summed up in one word: bold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつ、なんでこんな場所に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why is he in a place like this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの毛利家の跡取り息子にして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is the heir son of the Mōri family of JAPAN...
and one of the children of the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええっ、あいつも魔王の子なの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh?! He's also a child of the Demon King!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今は武者修行の旅に出ていると聞いたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard he's now on a warrior's training journey,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが魔物界で魔物退治たぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but him hunting monsters in the monster world..."
"Well, I guess that does sound like him."
"Ah, that's right, at times like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞の母ちゃんからの手紙を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's read the letter from <Yell>'s mom.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは長田君に促され、
母から送られた手紙を取り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you took out the letter your mother sent.
"The heir of the Mōri family, Mōri Motonari.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は魔王の四男に当たる人物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is said to be the fourth son of the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは早速、評価を見てみましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, let's take a look at his evaluation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友好は仲良くなる難度、捕捉は捕まえやすさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Friendliness is the difficulty in becoming close, Capture is how easy it is to catch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命令はあなたの言うことを聞いてくれるかです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Obedience is whether he will listen to your commands."
The heir of the Mōri family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毛利元就は非常に危険な人物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mōri Motonari is a very dangerous individual."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言動を間違えると殺されます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you make a mistake in your words or actions, you'll be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てか、気をつけてって何したらいいの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mean, what am I supposed to do to be careful!?
Like, not making eye contact or something...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「腹を空かせている時には近づかねぇとか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or not approaching when he's hungry or something?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
